A

AbstractClassFileTransformer - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util
Provides an ability to transform class files.

Performs a part of instantiation process that belongs to AbstractClassFileTransformer class.
acceptClassForTransformation(ClassLoader, String) - Method in class com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform.ClassFileTransformerExampleA
Returns true only if className is equal to "com/gl/vn/me/ko/sample/instrumentation/example/ExampleA".

An implementation of the method must decide whether the class can be transformed or not.
Agent - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.agent
Provides methods that can be used by Java-agent classes in order to fit an existing execution environment com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env*.

Constructor was made protected and not private because the class is supposed to be extended.

Default logging level for Java-agents.
AgentExampleAbc - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.agent
Java-agent class intended to access an instance of Instrumentation and register class file transformers for examples A, B and C in it.
AgentExampleD - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.agent
Java-agent class intended to access an instance of Instrumentation and redefine Java SE class String.

B

BigDecimalProxyFactoryExampleB - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.proxy
The class provides an ability to create a CGLib-proxy (enhanced object) of type BigDecimal that can intercept invocation of any non-final and non-private method of class BigDecimal and perform additional actions (see MethodInterceptorExampleB.intercept(Object, Method, Object[], MethodProxy)).

C

ClassFileTransformerExampleA - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform
Transforms ExampleA class by modifying its private method incrementCounter() according to the following algorithm:
search for any field access inside the method incrementCounter() if it's a write access and the JVM field signature is "I", replace the access by increment by 2 According to the algorithm described above, the original method body
ClassFileTransformerExampleB - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform
Transforms ExampleB class by modifying all its declared non-native methods according to the following algorithm:
for every declared non-native method in ExampleB search for BigDecimal constructor calls substitute any found call of BigDecimal constructor with call of BigDecimalProxyFactoryExampleB.create(...) method with the same arguments According to the described above algorithm, the original method body
ClassFileTransformerExampleC - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform
Transforms ExampleC class by modifying the return value of its private method createFaucetColorCodeMap().
ClassFileTransformerExampleD - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform
Transforms String class by modifying the body of its method String.toString().
ClassPoolManager - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.javassist
Provides a convenient API of creating and reusing an instance of ClassPool.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env
Contains classes that make up an environment necessary to execute examples.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc
Contains miscellaneous utility classes that are not directly related to examples.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example
Contains example classes.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.agent - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.agent
Contains Java-agent classes.

Contains sample classes for proxies.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform
Contains class file transformers.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util
Contains utility classes that are used in examples and can be reused as is or with modifications for other applications.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.cglib - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.cglib
Contains utility classes specific to CGLib framework that are used in examples and can be reused as is or with modifications for other applications.
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.javassist - package com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.javassist
Contains utility classes specific to Javassist framework that are used in examples and can be reused as is or with modifications for other applications.
CommandLineHelper - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc
This class helps to process command-line arguments.
CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc
This class defines possible application command-line arguments as described in JCommander documentation.
CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.ExampleNameConverter - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc
This class provides a method to convert a value of command-line argument into Java-object with the same type as CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.exampleName field.
CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.LogLevelConverter - Class in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env.misc
This class provides a method to convert a value command line-argument into Java-object with the same type as CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.logLevel field.

Converts String object into Level object that can be used as value of CommandLineHelper.CommandLineParams.logLevel field.

doTransform(CtClass) - Method in class com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.AbstractClassFileTransformer
An implementation of this method may transform the supplied class and return an array of transformed bytes in class file format as specified in "The Java Virtual Machine Specification".
